name.description: The unique name of the item. Do not use () or : in the name

progression.description: (Optional) Is this item needed to unlock locations? Defaults to false if not included.

count.description: (Optional) Number of copy of this item in the pool.

category.description: (Optional) The category(ies) this item fit in

useful.description: (Optional) Is this item usefull to have? Used for items that are not progression but you still want the rando to really use.

progression_skip_balancing.description: (Optional) Should this item not get included in progression balance swaps. For more info check the discord

trap.description: (Optional) Is this item a trap? Something the player doesnt want to get.

early.description: (Optional) Is this item required to be placed somewhere accessible from the start (Sphere 1)

local.description: (Optional) Is this item supposed to be only in your locations(true) or anywhere(false)

_comment.description: (Optional) Does nothing, Its mainly here for Dev notes for future devs to understand your logic
